item.title: Multiple Authors666
item.description: A quick example of how multiple authors could be used.

item.title: Thumbnails
item.description: A quick example of how to start using Thumbnails in your artciles.

item.title: Icons
item.description: Blowfish has built-in support for a number of FontAwesome 6 icons. These can be included in your website through either the icon partial or icon shortcode. Additionally, custom icons are also fully supported.

item.title: Markdown
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown formatting that can be used in Blowfish, also it shows how some basic HTML elements are decorated.

item.title: Mathematical notation
item.description: KaTeX can be used to render mathematical notation within articles.

item.title: Charts
item.description: Blowfish includes Chart.js for powerful charts and data visualisations.

item.title: Diagrams and Flowcharts
item.description: It’s easy to add diagrams and flowcharts to articles using Mermaid.
